headline: SBA Communications Corporation Announces Tax Reporting Information for 2025 Distributions
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., January 19, 2026--SBA Communications Corporation (Nasdaq: SBAC) ("SBA" or the "Company") today announced year-end tax reporting information for its 2025 distributions. Stockholders should consult with their personal tax advisors as to their specific tax treatment.

content.title: SBA Communications Corporation Announces Tax Reporting Information for 2025 Distributions
content.summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., January 19, 2026--SBA Communications Corporation (Nasdaq: SBAC) ("SBA" or the "Company") today announced year-end tax reporting information for its 2025 distributions. Stockholders should consult with their personal tax advisors as to their specific tax treatment.
